item.title: Electric Aviation Company Alleges ‘Corporate Espionage’ in Lawsuit Against Rival
item.description: Things are heating up between Joby Aviation and a competitor, Archer Aviation. Both make electric air taxis.

item.title: Ozempic Spells Trouble for the U.S. Economy—With 5 Exceptions
item.description: It’s not just the food industry—Ozempic and other GLP-1s are rewriting the rules of the economy. Here’s how brands can survive.

item.title: The Winners (and Losers) of This New Vibe-Coding Benchmark Will Surprise You
item.description: The race for best vibe-coding AI model is neck and neck, according to Vals AI.

item.title: Google Just Put a Massive Crack in Apple’s Walled Garden and It’s Good News For Everyone
item.description: Google just made the Pixel 10 compatible with one of Apple’s best features–AirDrop.

item.title: Dan Ives Says We’re 7 Years From Peak AI—and That the iPhone Proves It
item.description: The analyst used historical examples of tech skepticism to back his perspective.
